document_data.mainbody:
Keinen was a paladin in the service of Waterdeeps temple of Torm.
Keinen was an elderly man with long locks of white hair, sporting a significant beard that nearly reached his waist. Underneath his armor he wore a lengthy, green gambeson.
Although his goal was to become the leader of Torms Waterdhavian priesthood, Keinen knew deep inside that a quiet clerical life was not for him. His true passion was the art of combat, and he therefore chose to compromise by becoming a paladin.
Keinen wore a suit of banded mail. In combat he rode a brown warhorse with chain barding, and wielded a lance and shield.
